title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Extending an olive branch of peace to an estranged friend or rival is a sign of strength. However, youre not interested in just letting bygones be bygones. Its important that you both acknowledge how you hurt each other and what youre willing to do to make amends. Youre faced with a serious choice today as Mercury, Venus and the Sun congregate in the emotional realms of Scorpio and your 7th House of Relationships. You can choose to continue to be at odds with someone or raise the odds in your mutual favor. Abraham Lincoln wrote, The best way to destroy an enemy is to make him a friend. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
